services.title: What does DRK LAB do?
services.description: DRK LAB blends a rental warehouse with a 3D lab. We spot real on-set problems and design specific parts so they stop being problems.

items.title: 3D design for shoots
items.text: Parts built for everyday work: protections, caps, mounts, adapters and solutions you won't find in manufacturers' catalogues.

items.title: Printing with technical materials
items.text: High-quality PLA, fibre-reinforced compounds and materials made to handle impacts, heat and on-set abuse.

items.title: Rapid prototyping for rentals and production
items.text: From problem to functional part in a few days, with fast iterations until the fit is perfect.

featured.title: Featured products
featured.description: A selection of parts already working daily in rentals and crews.

custom.title: Custom parts for your team
custom.description: Need a specific part for a camera, monitor or light? DRK LAB can design and manufacture a solution tailored to your workflow.
items: · Adapters and mounts for cameras and accessories.
· Parts that are discontinued or never existed.

about.title: Who's behind DRK LAB?
about.description: DRK LAB is the personal project of Fran, an audiovisual technician and cinematographer. Working daily with cameras, lenses and lights in a rental, I've seen first-hand what breaks, what's lost and what's missing in the cases. That's where DRK LAB parts come from: small solutions solving very specific problems.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you're a rental, production company or freelance technician and have an idea or on-set problem, write me and let's talk.
contact.tagline: Built in Catalonia for shoots everywhere.

drk-cap-led.name: DRK-CAP LED · Protective Bowens cap
drk-cap-led.longDescription: Protective cap for Bowens-mount LED heads, designed to travel inside flightcases and survive daily rental abuse.
features: Compatible with most Bowens-mount COB LED fixtures
Protects the LED surface and front optics during transport
Impact-resistant 3D-printed body with reinforced front lip

technicalSpecs.label: Material
technicalSpecs.value: Technical filament (PAHT CF / PLA Pro depending on batch)

drk-cap-led.notes: Designed from real-world use at a professional rental; dimensions and fit can be adapted for other fixtures on request.

drk-case-media.name: DRK-CASE Media · Card cases
drk-case-media.longDescription: Modular case system to organise and protect SD, CFexpress B and CFast cards. Configurable inserts, built to slot into flightcases and handle rental life.
features: Configurable inserts by card type
Compact form factor for flightcases
Colour coding option for production or cameras
Secure latch that's easy to open with gloves

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: SD, CFexpress B and CFast cards

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Sony Tough CFexpress B, Angelbird, ProGrade SD

technicalSpecs.label: Colour
technicalSpecs.value: Charcoal black with optional interior colours

drk-hood-sh7.name: DRK-HOOD SH7 · Hood for Shinobi 7"
drk-hood-sh7.longDescription: Custom-fitted hood for the Atomos Shinobi 7" monitor. Improves outdoor visibility and adds extra protection with a mechanical fit—no adhesives needed.
features: Purpose-built for Shinobi 7"
Mechanical fit, no adhesives
Better screen readability outdoors
Adds extra protection to the panel

technicalSpecs.label: Usable inner diameter
technicalSpecs.value: Window matched to the Shinobi frame

drk-hood-sh7.notes: Currently in use within rental environments.

drk-honeycomb-v1s.name: DRK-HONEY V1S · Honeycomb for Godox V1s
drk-honeycomb-v1s.longDescription: Honeycomb for the Godox V1s flash with a pressure-fit system—no magnets or adhesives. Narrows beam angle to 40° to cut spill and improve light direction.
features: Compatible with Godox V1s
Pressure-fit system, no magnets or adhesives
40° beam angle (other angles on request)
Lightweight, heat-resistant material
Better light control and directionality
Reduces spill and unwanted reflections

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Godox V1s and V1 for Sony

drk-honeycomb-v1s.notes: Tested and validated for portrait sessions and indoor shoots.

drk-case-media-system.name: DRK-CASE MEDIA · Modular card case system
drk-case-media-system.longDescription: Modular case system to organise SD, CFexpress A, CFexpress B and CFast cards. Compact, rugged shell with fully configurable interiors, built for flights and heavy on-set use.
features: Configurable interiors for SD, CFexpress A, CFexpress B and/or CFast
Modular system to match any combination
Secure closure, optionally magnetic
Compact, impact-resistant outer shell
Designed for flightcases and set work
Option for colour coding or engraved production labels
'Custom' version for special cards or non-standard quantities

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: Mixed layouts for SD, CFexpress A/B and CFast

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Sony FX3/FX6 media kits, Blackmagic, Canon C70

technicalSpecs.label: Material
technicalSpecs.value: PA12 shell; interiors depending on configuration

drk-case-media-system.notes: Conceived as a single system. Interior variants can be built on demand per camera.

drk-merch-pro.name: DRK-MERCH PRO · Functional merch
drk-merch-pro.longDescription: Functional merchandising line for rentals, production companies and film schools: tool keychains, ID plates and useful accessories with your logo, created for real on-set use.
features: Custom 1/4'' and 3/8'' tool keychains with logo
Mini tools for cameras and accessories
Useful rental pieces with engraved or integrated logo
Fully bespoke design for each team, company or school
Rugged manufacturing with technical materials
Colour-coding option by department

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: Customisation for camera kits and rentals

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: FX3/FX6, ENG sound kits, rental flightcases

technicalSpecs.label: Material
technicalSpecs.value: Depends on the piece: TPU, PA12, light aluminium

technicalSpecs.label: Colour
technicalSpecs.value: Black base with corporate colour options

drk-merch-pro.notes: Open project: any small part can turn into functional merch with the client's logo.

drk-nato-150.name: DRK-NATO 150 · 150mm NATO rail
drk-nato-150.longDescription: 150mm NATO rail initially built for FX3/FX30 rigs, adaptable to any camera setup. PAHT-CF construction for stiffness, precise tolerances and low weight.
features: 150mm length for compact rigs
PAHT-CF technical material: strong, rigid and temperature stable
Tight tolerances for standard NATO clamps
Compatible with FX3/FX30 and adaptable to any camera
Low weight without losing stiffness
Ideal for handles, monitors and sound accessories

technicalSpecs.label: Compatible with
technicalSpecs.value: Standard NATO clamps and FX3/FX30 rigs

technicalSpecs.label: Tested models
technicalSpecs.value: Sony FX3/FX30 with SmallRig and Tilta

drk-nato-150.notes: Also available in custom lengths on request. Future compatibility with universal cheese plates, ARRI systems and hybrid mounts—under development.

drk-hinge-ls.name: DRK-HINGE LS · Lastolite hinge
drk-hinge-ls.longDescription: Replacement hinge for Lastolite folding frames. Reinforced thread, precise fit and rugged material to extend frame life without replacing the entire kit.
features: Full compatibility with Lastolite frames (left/right hinge)
Reinforced thread, more durable than the original
Tight fit with tolerances tested in rental use
Impact- and twist-resistant material
Ideal quick spare for worn kits
drk-hinge-ls.notes: Also available in packs of 2, 4 or 8 units for rental maintenance.
